description: Comprehensive evaluation dataset with varied complexity and specificity

categories.simple_factual: Direct fact retrieval from single entity

queries.query: What is the USGS site code?
queries.ground_truth: The USGS site code is 03339000

queries.query: What is the name of the USGS monitoring site?
queries.ground_truth: VERMILION RIVER NEAR DANVILLE, IL

queries.query: What state is the USGS site located in?
queries.ground_truth: Illinois

queries.query: How many EIA energy records are in the dataset?
queries.ground_truth: 211 EIA energy production records

queries.query: How many LAS curves are available?
queries.ground_truth: 27 LAS well log curves

queries.query: What is the total number of data records across all sources?
queries.ground_truth: 241 total records (211 EIA + 27 LAS curves + 1 LAS doc + 1 USGS site + 1 USGS measurement)

queries.query: How many USGS monitoring sites are in the database?
queries.ground_truth: 1 USGS monitoring site

queries.query: What are all the different data sources in the system?
queries.ground_truth: Five data source types: EIA records, LAS curves, LAS documents, USGS sites, USGS measurements

queries.query: What different domains are represented in the data?
queries.ground_truth: Three domains: energy, subsurface, surface_water

queries.query: What LAS curves measure gamma ray radiation?
queries.ground_truth: GSGR (Gamma ray log)

queries.query: Which curve represents bulk density?
queries.ground_truth: RHOB curve represents bulk density of formation

queries.query: What does the DEPT curve measure?
queries.ground_truth: DEPT measures depth for the well log

queries.query: What subsurface formation data is available?
queries.ground_truth: Well log curves including gamma ray, density, porosity, and other formation properties

queries.query: What energy production information is in the database?
queries.ground_truth: 211 EIA energy production records for oil and gas wells

queries.query: What surface water monitoring data exists?
queries.ground_truth: USGS site and measurement data for Vermilion River

queries.query: What lithology identification tools are available in the well logs?
queries.ground_truth: PEF (Photoelectric factor) for lithology identification

queries.query: What is the most recent year represented in the EIA data?
What data is available from Indiana?
queries.ground_truth: 211 EIA production records from Indiana

queries.query: Where is the Vermilion River monitoring site located?
queries.ground_truth: Near Danville, Illinois

queries.query: How many subsurface data records are there?
queries.ground_truth: 28 subsurface records (27 LAS curves + 1 LAS document)

queries.query: What spectral gamma ray curves are available?
queries.ground_truth: GSTK (potassium), GST (thorium), GSK (uranium) spectral gamma ray curves

queries.query: Which domain has the most data records?
queries.ground_truth: Energy domain has the most records (211 EIA records)

queries.query: What types of porosity measurements are available in the well logs?
queries.ground_truth: NPHI (Neutron porosity) measuring hydrogen content

queries.query: What is the weather forecast for tomorrow?
queries.ground_truth: This question is out of scope - no weather data in system

queries.query: How many Bitcoin records are in the database?
queries.ground_truth: No Bitcoin or cryptocurrency data in system
